Name: Vampire Story
About the game: Vampire Story - this is a 2D RPG with elements of survival in which you will need to complete the tasks of the demon you serve. In this game you will play as a vampire, who, thanks to a deal with a demon, became his subordinate.You will have to go through various quests, travel to various locations, fight monsters, look for different treasure chests, but you should not forget that you are a vampire and you will need to disguise yourself so that people do not understand that you are a vampire because they will not be happy about your appearance.It's worth remembering that vampires are nocturnal creatures and sunlight damages them.Therefore, you will have to travel at night or use a special potion. Key Features : - Open world - Survival system.You will need to disguise yourself from people, drink blood and try not to burn in the sun during the day. - Various locations and monsters. - Multiple endings
